docs.text: tuilwindcss ¶ This project is inspired by tailwind.css to offers a similar set of classes that can be used directly to construct TUI apps with Textual . It's an experimental project to see if it makes it easier to construct apps. A collection of available classes are shown in the gallery below. Tailwind Compatible Classes ¶ Background Color ¶ This project attemps to mimic the colors that tailwind.css provides . This includes background colors, but text and border colors too.
